head.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="wrap_content" >

    <LinearLayout
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="94dp"
        layout_marginTop="44dp"
        background="bg_browser_settings"
        function="settings"
        orientation="horizontal"
        visibility="gone" >

        <RelativeLayout
            id="@+id/text_size_bar"
            layout_width="0dp"
            layout_height="fill_parent"
            layout_weight="1" >

            <RelativeLayout
                id="@+id/text_size_frame"
                layout_width="wrap_content"
                layout_height="wrap_content"
                layout_centerHorizontal="true"
                layout_marginTop="10dp"
                background="bg_browser_settings_empty"
                padding="4.5dp" >

                <Button
                    id="@+id/button_minus"
                    layout_width="wrap_content"
                    layout_height="wrap_content"
                    background="btn_browser_settings_size_minus"
                    click="font_minus"
                    function="font_minus"
                    select_bg="btn_browser_settings_size_minus_disable"
                    unselect_bg="btn_browser_settings_size_minus" />

                <Button
                    id="@+id/button_plus"
                    layout_width="wrap_content"
                    layout_height="wrap_content"
                    layout_toRightOf="@+id/button_minus"
                    background="btn_browser_settings_size_plus"
                    click="font_plus"
                    function="font_plus"
                    select_bg="btn_browser_settings_size_plus_disable"
                    unselect_bg="btn_browser_settings_size_plus" />
            </RelativeLayout>

            <ImageView
                id="@+id/text_size"
                layout_width="wrap_content"
                layout_height="wrap_content"
                layout_below="@+id/text_size_frame"
                layout_centerHorizontal="true"
                layout_marginTop="1dp"
                background="ico_browser_settings_text_size"
                contentDescription="@null" />
        </RelativeLayout>

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/settings_divider"
            layout_width="wrap_content"
            layout_height="wrap_content"
            layout_gravity="center_vertical"
            contentDescription="@null"
            src="bg_browser_settings_divider" />

        <RelativeLayout
            layout_width="0dp"
            layout_height="wrap_content"
            layout_weight="1" >

            <RelativeLayout
                id="@+id/line_height_frame"
                layout_width="wrap_content"
                layout_height="wrap_content"
                layout_alignParentTop="true"
                layout_centerHorizontal="true"
                layout_marginTop="10dp"
                background="bg_browser_settings_empty"
                padding="4.5dp" >

                <Button
                    id="@+id/button_height_minus"
                    layout_width="wrap_content"
                    layout_height="wrap_content"
                    background="btn_browser_settings_height_minus"
                    click="spacing_minus"
                    function="spacing_minus"
                    select_bg="btn_browser_settings_height_minus_disable"
                    unselect_bg="btn_browser_settings_height_minus" />

                <Button
                    id="@+id/button_height_plus"
                    layout_width="wrap_content"
                    layout_height="wrap_content"
                    layout_toRightOf="@id/button_height_minus"
                    background="btn_browser_settings_height_plus"
                    click="spacing_plus"
                    function="spacing_plus"
                    select_bg="btn_browser_settings_height_plus_disable"
                    unselect_bg="btn_browser_settings_height_plus" />
            </RelativeLayout>

            <ImageView
                id="@+id/line_height"
                layout_width="wrap_content"
                layout_height="wrap_content"
                layout_below="@id/line_height_frame"
                layout_centerHorizontal="true"
                layout_marginTop="1dp"
                background="ico_browser_settings_line_height"
                contentDescription="@null" />
        </RelativeLayout>
    </LinearLayout>

    <RelativeLayout
        id="@+id/default_article_toolbar"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="44dp"
        background="index_nav_bg" >

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/default_article_back_btn"
            layout_width="44dp"
            layout_height="44dp"
            layout_marginLeft="5dp"
            click="back"
            src="ic_back" />

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/default_article_share_btn"
            layout_width="44dp"
            layout_height="44dp"
            layout_alignParentRight="true"
            layout_marginRight="5dp"
            click="share_img"
            function="share_img"
            src="article_nav_share" />

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/default_article_fav_btn"
            layout_width="44dp"
            layout_height="44dp"
            layout_toLeftOf="@+id/default_article_share_btn"
            click="fav"
            function="fav"
            select_bg="article_nav_faved"
            src="article_nav_fav"
            unselect_bg="article_nav_fav" />

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/default_article_font_btn"
            layout_width="44dp"
            layout_height="44dp"
            layout_toLeftOf="@+id/default_article_fav_btn"
            click="font_img"
            function="font_img"
            src="article_nav_font_size" />
        
        <ImageView
            id="@+id/default_article_comment_btn"
            layout_width="44dp"
            layout_height="44dp"
            layout_toLeftOf="@+id/default_article_font_btn"
            click="article_card"
            function="article_card"
            src="article_nav_comment" />
    </RelativeLayout>

</RelativeLayout>
